pages.text_verbatim_title_block:
Project: 790 GLASSGOW ST
Client: CATHERINE KAN
Drg. Title: SITE PLAN
Drawn By: Thasleema Shaji
Checked By: Date: 03/07/2025
CAD Ref: SCALE: Sheet No: Job No: KAN
Revision No: 00
pages.general_notes_verbatim:
IT IS THE CONTRACTOR'S RESPONSIBILITY TO ENSURE THAT ALL CONSTRUCTION CONFORMS TO THE REQUIREMENTS OF THE ONTARIO BUILDING CODE. NOTATIONS MADE ON THESE DRAWINGS ARE FOR YOUR INFORMATION AND ASSISTANCE ONLY AND DO NOT NECESSARILY COMMENT ON ALL AREAS OF CONSTRUCTION.
THE FINAL GRADING OF THIS PROPERTY SHALL NOT ADVERSELY EFFECT THE DRAINAGE OF ADJACENT PROPERTIES OR THE OVERALL GRADING CONTROL PLAN.
THE ONTARIO BUILDING CODE REQUIRES THAT A COPY OF THE DRAWINGS AND SPECIFICATIONS THAT HAVE BEEN REVIEWED BY OUR DEPARTMENT BE KEPT AT THE CONSTRUCTION SITE AT ALL TIMES.
pages.page_overview_summary: This site plan outlines the property boundaries, landscaping, and building footprint for the project located at 790 Glassgow St. It includes important notes regarding compliance with the Ontario Building Code and grading requirements. The plan is essential for understanding the layout and external features of the site.

This information is crucial for understanding the current state and planning the renovation.
